title: Dread Nova Darius not appearing as an option to unlock using Gemstones
body: So I don't play vayne or annie so I have been saving up my gemstones for quite awhile now to see if riot would release a new skin in hextech that i would like to get. Dread Nova Darius ended up being that skin. Although now with the new patch out I went to go and try and unlock him and he is not listed as an option and I was hoping someone could explain to me why that is.  I just hope i don' t have unlock one of the hextech exclusives first in order to make Dread Nova Darius appear as an option.

replies.body:
Hello hello! 

Dreadnova Darius hasn't been unlocked yet. Like other skins, Loot exclusive skins may not unlock the first day of the new patch. There should be an announcement when he is unlocked.
Rito pls, its the 11th now. Where is that dar skin? Im dying of waiting.{{champion:122}} {{item:3070}}
how can you check what skins are available to unlock in hextech?
You can right click on a Gemstone and see it.
Bought 100 chests and now i have to wait because they cant release skin right after patch,lee sin skin isnt avaliable either
same i cant see him neither
It still needs to be "unlocked" just like any other skin. Riot never releases skins/champions the moment the servers come back on. They usually wait either mid day or a couple of days!
